channel.title: Math 324 Announcements
channel.description: Announcements for section A of Math 324 at the University of Washington

item.title: Answers to final exam
item.description: Here are the answers. Grades will be posted on Catalyst as soon as I am done grading.

item.title: Exam pick up
item.description: I will be in my office from 9-10 am on Tuesday, August 23, to return exams or answers questions you have about the exam. If you don't pick up your exam on Tuesday, you can send me an email in October, November, or December to pick up your exam. After that, they will be shredded.

item.title: Special Office Hours
item.description: I will be holding special office hours on Thursday from 2-3. This is in addition to my standard office hours Wednesday at 3:30.
